mapper.select: SELECT book_code, cart_seq, user_seq, li_book_info, book_name, book_author, book_pub, book_img FROM user_cart JOIN li_book USING(book_code) JOIN book USING(book_isbn) WHERE user_seq = #{_parameter} ORDER BY cart_seq
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_res(res_id, book_code, user_seq, res_day, res_pick, lib_id) VALUES (user_res_seq.nextval, #{book_code}, #{user_seq}, to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'), null, #{lib_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE li_book SET book_res = CASE WHEN (SELECT res_pick FROM li_book JOIN user_res USING(book_code) WHERE res_pick IS NULL AND book_code=?) = 'null' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END WHERE book_code= #{book_code}
